Salon & Spa
Special Interest Clubs
The Lodge
Lifestyle
Picture a social and outdoor country club lifestyle in Florida and you will find Hunters Run. It is truly a special paradise offering an abundance of opportunities to enjoy country club living in South Florida.
Discover new found interests, play golf, tennis or pickleball year-round, or share your experiences with long time friends and new ones. Stroll with friends on the miles of walking paths where you're sure to meet others with four-legged family. Run with your partner or bicycle with your spouse within the safety and lushness of the community.
A broad spectrum of social activities will keep you as active or as relaxed as you choose to be. The Clubhouse is the place for happy hour, cards and other leisurely pursuits.
You will always have something to do at Hunters Run.
Real Estate

Contact Us
We want to hear from you!
To learn more about everything that Hunters Run has to offer you, please contact us at
561-737-2582
or request one of our associates to contact you by filling out the form on the right.
Thanks for your interest in Hunters Run Country Club.
Need a Realtor?
A realtor is needed to see homes on the market in Hunters Run.
Contact a realtor of your choice or a list of recommended agents who are familiar with the Club can be emailed to you. Please call our Director of Membership at 561-735-4039 for assistance and membership information.

Membership
Hunters Run has been a classic gem in South Palm Beach since 1979.  The community is the closest private club with 3 golf courses near Delray Beach’s famous Atlantic Avenue and the ocean.
Members are required to maintain a social membership and can upgrade to Golf or Racquet Sports levels every fiscal year.
There's a homestyle that fits every phase of life from single-family homes, estate homes, town homes, and villas to the ever-convenient condominium that starts at 1,300 sq feet.
To learn about ownership opportunities and membership, please contact our Director of Membership at
561-735-4039
.
Contact Us
Show Web Content (Article), Last Updated By:
Membership Categories
SOCIAL MEMBERSHIP
Enjoy unlimited access to the restaurants, bar lounges, aquatics, fitness center, Salon & Spa, and invitations to social events, special interest clubs, and year-round parties.
RACQUET SPORTS MEMBERSHIP
Enjoy all the benefits of a Social Membership and unlimited access to the tennis and pickleball courts, events, and tournaments.
GOLF MEMBERSHIP
This inclusive membership category includes unlimited access to social activities, dining, tennis and pickleball, our TopTracer Driving Range and practice greens, and access to 54 holes of championship golf with no additional green fees.

Membership
Hunters Run has been a classic gem in South Palm Beach since 1979.  The community is the closest private club with 3 golf courses near Delray Beach’s famous Atlantic Avenue and the ocean.
Members are required to maintain a social membership and can upgrade to Golf or Racquet Sports levels every fiscal year.
There's a homestyle that fits every phase of life from single-family homes, estate homes, town homes, and villas to the ever-convenient condominium that starts at 1,300 sq feet.
To learn about ownership opportunities and membership, please contact our Director of Membership at
561-735-4039
.
